title: Quadcopter
overview: Quadcopter is an aerial robot combining a simple propeller mechanism with powerful electronics for limitless real-world applications. It is an embedded system comprising of microcontrollers, sensors, flight gear and other integrated components.This workshop helps participants to develop a Quadcopter project from scratch while understanding the various engineering concepts in making a working Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
schedule:
• Fundamentals of Rotor Dynamics.

  • Various components of a Quadcopter.

  • Stability and Control of a Quadcopter.

  • Introduction to Quadcopter Design.

  • Basics of PID tuning.

  • Introduction to Electronics and Sensor calibration.

  • Professional Flight lessons from TechEagle Pilots
particulars:
Particulars

  • Date: Sept 8th & 9th

  • Cost: 1000 per person - ( Kit to be given to Team of 5,excluding transmitter and receiver )

  • Venue: Govt Model Engineering College

  • Timing: 9:30 am - 4:30 pm

  • Hands on 2 day workshop

  • Laptops and Chargers required

  • Accommodation can be provided to external participants ( Gents only ) at the men's hostel

  • Certificates to be provided

title: Augmented Reality
overview: Augmented reality is one of the present cutting edge technology. Which allows for a digitally manipulable, enhanced and interactive view of users real world.Among the other reality technologies, augmented reality lies in the middle of the mixed reality spectrum, being between the real and virtual world.This workshop will enable participants to work with AR modules, build modules including overlaying text, video, 2D and 3D elements. Animation and interaction with elements by making responsive AR.
schedule:
• Introduction to UNITY
  • Why UNITY ?
  • Getting Started with UNITY.
  • Learning the interface.
  • Introduction to UNITY Scripting
  • Scripting Tools.
  • Unity Programming Syntax.
  • Touch Inputs.
  • Moving 2D/3D objects with touch Inputs.
  • Augmented Reality
  • Introduction.
  • Different AR degrees.
  • Augmented / Virtual Reality.
  • Google Cardboard.
  • Plugins for Augmented Reality
  • Introduction to Vuforia.
  • Creating a tracker.
  • Detecting tracker.
  • Interacting with 3D Objects in Augmented Reality.
particulars:

  • Timing: 9:30 AM - 4:30 PM
  • Laptops and Chargers required

title: Artificial Intelligence
overview: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a field that has a long history but is still constantly and actively growing and changing. In this workshop you’ll learn the basics of modern AI as well as some of the representative applications of AI. An introduction to Software tool used for AI will also be covered in the workshop
schedule:
• Introduction to AI
  • Different areas in AI
  • Major players in AI
  • Introduction to Mahcine learning
  • Supervised and Unsupervised learning
  • The Different ML Algortihms
  • Introduction to Deep learning
  • Liner regression
  • Logistic regression
  • Artificial Neural Networks
  • Concepts in Deep Learning
  • Different Types of Networks
  • Introduction to Software tools used
particulars:
• Date: October 5th & 6th
  • Registration Fee: ₹700 per person
  • Venue: Govt. Model Engineering College
  • Timing: 9:30 AM - 4:30 PM
  • Laptops and Chargers required
  • Basic knowledge in Python and Linux
  • Accommodation can be provided to external participants (Gents only) at the men's hostel
  • Certificates will be provided

title: Guest Lectures
overview:
Behold curious minds. Ever wondered how scientific or technological breakthroughs occur? Dreamt of interacting with minds who have brought new dimensions to conventions? Introducing the Guest Lectures of Excel 2017, all new with the theme “Discover|Define|Defy, lines”.

A line represents a path we follow. A path that defines us as we explore it. Focussing on new technical ideas and aspects, we bring in a set of diverse speakers who would enlighten us with their experiences on traversing these paths.
particulars:
Venue: College Auditorium

Speakers

To be announced soon

Contacts

Malavika Vasudevan : 9400242440

Joe Varghese Kurien : 9995294391
schedule:
Day 1: Discover: Explore the latest technologies and realise how each one of them can bring out a change. To discover the real shift that needs to happen to go from believing that you have some innate calling, something you were "meant" to do, to understanding that you create your own sense of meaning and purpose in life.


Day 2: Define: Get to know the latest innovations and get dissolved into them. Develop a perspective on career objective, what one has to aspire to be and where one should hope to go in their work life. Taking in account practical and objective views, reflect a career dream as success follows a well thought out plan.


Day 3: Defy: A guide to venture into something out of the box. Giving up well off jobs to venture into the unknown or overcoming stereotypes that control our society is the leap of faith being glorified. Get to realise that life make or break moments which are hinged on the crucial step of “Deciding to Act”.
